title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Educational Services
body: Educational Services       Listed below are the authorized educational services for the Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area. Click the web address to go to their respective website.       Kayak Classes of Georgia 125 Floss Flower Court Roswell, GA 30076 www.KayakClassesGa.com 770-513-3900   Kayak instruction on the Chattahoochee River, primarily from Johnson Ferry North to Paces Mill.          REI Outdoor School 6750 S. 2298th Street Kent, WA 98032 www.REI.com/outdoorschool 253-437-5720   Experiential outdoor education on introductory hiking, cycling, navigation, paddling, climbing, and running.
